document.heading: PRE-K ACCELERATION AND CLARIFICATION AMENDMENT ACT OF 2010.

history.narrative: Law 18-285, the “Pre-k Acceleration and Clarification Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-605, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 13, 2010, and November 9, 2010, respectively. Enacted without signature of the Mayor on December 2, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-595 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-285 became effective on March 8, 2011.
